#Whitelist support for front flash
FrontFlash
{
    com.tencent.mm
    com.tencent.mobileqq
    com.whatsapp
    com.facebook.orca
    org.telegram.messenger
    com.snapchat.android
}

WechatVideo
{
    com.tencent.mm
}

ThirdpartyVideo
{
    com.whatsapp
    org.telegram.messenger
    com.google.android.apps.tachyon
    us.zoom.videomeetings
    com.viber.voip
    jp.naver.line.android
    com.google.android.apps.messaging
    com.smile.gifmaker
    air.tv.douyu.android
}

whatsappVideo
{
    com.whatsapp
}

SpecialfrontTp
{
    com.tencent.mm
    org.codeaurora.ims
    com.whatsapp
}

SpecialrearTp
{
    com.qiyi.video
    com.zhihu.android
    com.dangdang.buy2
    com.ss.android.auto
}

TwiceConfigFlash
{
    com.qingqikeji.blackhorse.passenger
}

ForcePipline3rdPart
{
    com.google.android.apps.messaging
    com.ss.android.auto
    com.dangdang.buy2
    com.qingqikeji.blackhorse.passenger
}

DouYvLive
{
    air.tv.douyu.android
}
